Interior Designer: With the ability to see through walls, you could plan and design rooms with ease. You could visualize the layout and placement of furniture and decor, making sure everything flows well and looks great.
Hidden Treasure Hunter: You could use your power to search for hidden treasures, such as lost artifacts or buried treasure, by looking for clues and signs of past activity through walls.
Secret Agent: You could use your ability to gather information on your surroundings and gather intel on your enemies by peering through walls to see what they are up to.
Ghostbuster: You could use your power to see through walls to help you track and capture ghosts or other supernatural entities that may be hiding in them.
Home Security: You could use your ability to keep an eye on your home or office by peering through walls to make sure everything is safe and secure.
